name: Divide
description: Divide is a character-driven, science fiction action/adventure game with a modern take on isometric adventures of the past. Search for clues that reveal new insight into the story, interact with fully realized characters, and combat enemies by hacking out of sight, or launching a direct assault.
minimum_requirements: OS: Windows 7 32-bit or later Processor: Intel core i3 or AMD FX 6100 Memory: 4 GB RAM Graphics: NVidia 660 or Radeon HD7870 1GB VRAM DirectX: Version 11 Storage: 3 GB available space Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Additional Notes: An XINput compatible gamepad is required to play this game. XBox 360, XBox One, PS4, Steam Controller or similar.
